short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 给页面中的DOM或者任意区域截图~
short.en: Take a screenshot of the DOM or any area of the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
一个浏览器扩展，可以选择页面中某个 DOM 元素进行截图，也可以框选某个区域进行截图。

支持所有常见的基于 Chromium 的现代浏览器： Chrome、Edge、360急速浏览器、搜狗、QQ浏览器... 

安装后请重启浏览器。
安装后请将扩展固定顶部， 方便不使用快捷键时点击图标进行截图

开源并且免费： https://github.com/wangzongming/web-screenshot
long.en:
A browser extension that can select a DOM element in the page to take a screenshot, and can also select an area to take a screenshot.
 
Support for all common Chromium-based modern browsers: Chrome, Edge, 360 Quick browser, Sogou, QQ browser...

Restart the browser after installation.

After installation, fix the extension on the top, so that you can click the icon to take a screenshot without using shortcut keys

Github： https://github.com/wangzongming/web-screenshot
